column6: Who is the Black Panther? Part 2 (of 6) While a team of super-powered mercenaries prepares their assault on Wakanda, a contest is underway in that warrior kingdom: Who will be the next Black Panther?
column8: | letterer:Chris Eliopoulos | writer:Reginald Hudlin | inker:Klaus Janson | penciller (cover):Esad Ribic | penciller:John Romita JR. | colorist:Dean White
